data.title: Good atmosphere.
data.text:
We were wanting something quick and honestly you can never go wrong with diner food.  Service was quick and efficient and very friendly.  My daughter asked for a salad after we already placed our orders and she didn't even charge us for it!  Food was hot and delicious.  Nothing to complain about!  
Food was delicious, but I would easily go back just for the customer service!

data.title: Wi-Fi -not really
data.text:
Harley was our server. She was really busy and did a great job keeping glasses full. 
Pancakes and French Toast could have been cooked another couple of minutes as they were gooey in their centers. 
Country  Fried was really good. Belgian Waffle was good. 
Wi-Fi never would connect more than one bar and then kept dropping off after that. 
AC was cranked up and needed to hand out sweaters upon entry.

data.title: Old Time Favorite
data.text: We haven't been to a Denny's in years.  So we stopped in to enjoy an old favorite.  To our dismay there was no longer a Patty Melt on their menu.  We did order something else, and we were very pleased.  Now for the negative.  It appears the staffing was very short handed and those who were there, really did their very best.  All in all, everything was fine.

data.title: Remodeled restaurant has excellent service and food
data.text: Since they tore down and rebuilt this restaurant it is cleaner, roomier and brighter.  A wide variety of items on the menu.  Service was very good. Employees seem to take pride in their new surroundings and their service shows it!

data.title: They tore down the old Dennys and built a new one
data.text: Same excellent food in a nicer setting.  I love Denny's always have and probably always will.  I have eaten at Denny's all over the US.  I love that I can get my favorites at any of the Dennys.

data.title: Jalapeno bacon is great
data.text: I stopped in the newly opened Denny's.  I was seated in a booth. I ordered coffee and the new triple bacon breakfast with scrambled eggs and hash browns.  The waitress did not ask what type of toast I wanted as she quickly took off. The triple bacon comes with slices of turkey, jalapeno and regular bacon. The turkey bacon has no flavor but certainly is chewy; they could sell this as jerky. The jalapeno was surprisingly a good balance between jalapeno and bacon flavors.  It was spicy without overwhelming the finer flavors of fried bacon.  The regular bacon almost suffered in comparison.  It had an okay bacon flavor but not as strong as the jalapeño bacon.  Overall not a bad breakfast.

data.title: Denny's is just average
data.text: We have ate at this Denny's several time its not the best  Denny's. The food is ok, The problem is in the service, you wait to long to get served, some times your food not hot.

data.title: Free grand slam
data.text: Had a free grand slam for my birthday.  Service was great.  The food came out hot and was very good.  Our coffee cup was never empty!

data.title: The worst Denny's of my life
data.text: I have NEVER had a bad Denny's experience, but this place is filthy. Staff is not friendly. You can tell they just don't care if they have business or not. The bathroom was horrendous - no soap to wash with, floor was littered with debris, water everywhere, sinks filthy... I could go on, but will only just suggest you steer clear of this restaurant!

data.title: Great downtown location
data.text: Breakfast is good 24 hours a day !  The rest of the menu is good, but I always love to order breakfast no matter what time of day.  Ask for Ronnie as a server - she is fabulous !!

data.title: Poor Service & Food
data.text: The atmosphere of the restaurant overall is dismal. They weren't busy at all, yet there were unclean tables and floors upon arrival. There was a conflict with what I wanted to order, which was not resolved by our dull, uninterested waitress. She only came back to check on us once during the entire meal. The food wasn't really hot either. I would recommend the other Terre Haute Denny's location any day.

data.title: Big change 😊
data.text: We had been to this Denny's 8 mos ago and the food and service were horrible.  We enjoy Denny's so we simply drove a few miles further to another one where food and service are just fine. Finally we gave this one another try. There must be new staff there now. The wait staff was attentive and friendly. The food was a Denny's best.  So ignore my 2014 review and if you're in Terre Haute, all our Denny's are good.

data.title: Not Clean
data.text: Floors and tables were all dirty as well as the bathrooms. So watch out I seen the kitchen. Food was fair.

data.title: Pleasantly Surprised
data.text:
Normally our preference for a chain restaurant is Bob Evans or IHOP, but we hadn't been to Denny's for awhile (and at the south location it had been decades). We chose this location because it was between our going from Point A to Point B.

The wait staff was attentive, helpful; and the food was incredibly delicious.

data.title: Worst service
data.text: We had to just seat ourselves. Waited for someone to seat us no one ever came. The booth and floor was dirty trash everywhere. But it seem every bootb was like that. Our Waiter Jordan took 30 minutes to even come greet us and get drink orders. I ordered an ice coffee and my boyfriend got a strawberry milkshake. He just gave him the cup No Extra in the tin like normal. My ice coffee was  horrible. Taste so nasty.   We sat there for over 45 minutes waiting on our food when the place only had about 9 other people in there. Food could of been way better and the service sucked. I was very very disappointed.  I will never ever go back there again.

data.title: GASTHOF SERVICE!!!!!
data.text: We were looking somewhere to eat when we came across Denny's. The waitress Penny was GREAT! Our food was cooked exactly like we asked. Never have I been anywhere and the cook got my eggs right but Pete did!

data.title: Average place to eat
data.text: We asked at the hotel and were recommended here.  Food was ok, service wasn't quick but it was ok.  it filled us enough to continue on our way to Branson.

data.title: Economical and tasty
data.text: Denny's is a reliable place to eat where the food is tasty, service is more than adequate and prices are reasonable.

data.title: slow service.
data.text: We were in there about 10:00 pm and there were not many people in there and we still had to wait an hour for food.  Our waitress was very nice and accommodating and she also gave us a discount on our food.

data.title: Don't eat here
data.text: We stop in after the girl state finals about 11:15 pm.  Only five or six tables of people eating.  Waited 5 minutes to be seated.  The waitress saw 4 of us standing there, when we said there were 5 of us she sighed loudly and rolled her eyes.  We were put in the back corner.  It took along time to get our order and then one was wrong and sent back.  Twenty minutes later it was brought back still wrong.  At that point we were all done eating and the person decided she was too tired too wait for food and was done with it.  In the mean time waiting on our check we found lettuce in 2 of our 4 water glasses.  They did not charge us for the meal we did not get. Ha!  Our waitress did not even come out to give us our check we had to go to the cashier and ask for one.  Service was BAD!
